inputs.remark: 缺少V2，包括Earlens aided soundfield thresholds，Post-treatment HIST，Subjective outcomes

logic_summary: Added V2 encounter dated 2016-09-13 based on Fig 37.5 and text descriptions.
Included Earlens aided soundfield thresholds with improvement metrics derived from text.
Included Post-treatment HIST results showing -2.8 dB RTS.
Included Subjective outcomes from the manufacturer questionnaire and patient report.

history.present_illness: Follow-up after 2-month fitting optimization period with Earlens hearing aids. Patient also compared Earlens with his original acoustic aids for 2 weeks.
history.patient_goals: Evaluate benefit of Earlens device and compare with acoustic aids.

tests.name: Soundfield Thresholds
tests.key_findings: Significant improvement in high-frequency audibility compared to open-fit aids. Improvements of 25-40 dB HL (Right) noted between 2,000-10,000 Hz and 20-35 dB HL (Left) noted between 1,000-10,000 Hz.

tests.name: Speech-in-noise (HIST)
tests.key_findings: RTS of -2.8 dB, representing a 5.8 dB SNR improvement over open-fit aids (which were +3.0 dB).

tests.name: Subjective Assessment
tests.key_findings: Patient reported speech and music sounded clearer and more natural with Earlens compared to acoustic devices. Denied autophony and damping effects. Elected to keep Earlens.
